[[Image:thomas_morwinsky.jpg|thumb|right|Morwinsky]]

'''Thomas Morwinsky''' (born [[1967]]), German Doctor in natural sciences, is editor of the journal ''[[Other Minds]]''. He has created several maps and written a number of articles about role-playing adaptations of Tolkien's legendarium.
